description:
A semi-rimless design and large cylindrical lens gives you massive field of view, while ChromaPop lenses keep edges crisp and colours vibrant. Equipped with the excellent MAG™ lens changing system swapping between the 2 included lenses easy.

  • Designed for medium faces
  • ChromaPop® lenses deliver exceptional clarity, high contrast, and dynamic colour optimization, making them great for challenging light conditions
  • MAG lens changing system combines magnets with a lens carrier locking mechanism. Adding a locking carrier to the MAG system this prevents the lens from experiencing any rotational shift and adds an extra measure of security over magnets alone. A simple push of one lever at either side of the lens releases the lens for easy swapping
  • 5X™ anti-fog inner lens, helps keep your vision clear
  • Cylindrical Carbonic-X lens with TLT optics
  • Utilizes Smith’s Responsive Fit™ design, making the frame very flexible without losing strength, allowing the frame to adjust to contours of a variety of face shapes all while reducing weight
  • 3-layer DriWix foam provides a comfortable, breathable seal
  • Strap has silicone strips to keep it in place
  • Blackout and Pacific Flow colourways includes a spare ChromaPop Storm Blue Sensor mirror with 55% visible light transmission
  • Elena Hight colourways include a spare ChromaPop Storm Rose with 50% visible light transmission
  • Includes an extra lens, custom gogglesoc™ and a microfiber goggle bag
name: Smith Squad Mag Goggles - Unisex
